value.0: The Lava Crystal is a lightsaber crystal that can only be found on volcanic planets and moons such as Mustafar. It generates a blade that resembled lava. The crystal itself is less focused and concentrated than normal crystals, therefore lava itself is generated from the extreme heat of the blade and sometimes splashes and drips out from the blade itself. This rare crystal is rumored to be very powerful.

The Lava Crystal is a lightsaber crystal that can only be found on volcanic planets and moons such as Mustafar. It generates a blade that resembled lava. The crystal itself is less focused and concentrated than normal crystals, therefore lava itself is generated from the extreme heat of the blade and sometimes splashes and drips out from the blade itself. This rare crystal is rumored to be very powerful.
